header.title: GoodLabs – good
header.text1: Vitamins for a strong foundation for your health
header.text2: Everything has its foundation. The foundation of human health is a sufficient amount of vitamins and minerals in the body. GoodLabs products are designed to strengthen this foundation and help you live a full life.

formula.title: GoodLabs is German quality formulations and production
formula.desc: We are proud of the formulations of our products and modern production sites in Germany. Each of our products is crafted by professionals with years of experience, based on cutting-edge research from nutritional scientists. Goodlabs product formulations meet human health needs as effectively as possible.

products.title: Why GoodLabs products were created
products.desc: We know how hard it is to find a good health product. Many people have to try, make mistakes, and try again. GoodLabs vitamins and minerals are created to make sure you don't make mistakes. With our clever product formulations and assortments, most basic health needs can be met

reviewArray.text: Well, finally, vitamin complexes with a truly balanced composition appeared on sale! GoodLabs Multivitamin has a good dosage and is well absorbed by the body.
reviewArray.name: Maria Bart

reviewArray.text: I have been looking for a complex remedy with balanced ingredients for a long time. Immunal was my discovery in this regard. Good prophylactic dosages and excellent bioavailability.
reviewArray.name: Stephan Collins

reviewArray.text: For me personally, the GoodLabs Multivitamin is the best I have tried. There is a good composition, each component has scientific confirmation of its effectiveness.
reviewArray.name: Luca Fischer

reviewArray.text: I`ve started taking Multivitamin `cause I felt a lack of energy. For now it`s fine.
reviewArray.name: Hans Hoffmann

reviewArray.text: I discovered for myself another way to improve immunity by taking the Immunal complex. It contains beta-glucan, which increases the body's resistance during high season of acute respiratory viral infections.
reviewArray.name: Michael Stolz

reviewArray.text: I take Immunal , as well as my elderly parents do. I am worried about their life and health, so I try to support their immunity with fruits and the Immunal complex.
reviewArray.name: Hans Schulz

reviewArray.text: I used to get sick often, but now not a single flu can knock me off my feet. That's what good immunity means!
reviewArray.name: Christian Bart

reviewArray.text: It is a wonderful combination of vitamins, natural extracts and micro-elements that keeps you on your feet at the first sign of a cold.
reviewArray.name: Petra Hoffman

reviewArray.text: Good dosage. I have been looking for a complex remedy for a long time, in which all components will be balanced. Goodlabs was my discovery in this regard. Good prophylactic dosages.
reviewArray.name: David Barter

reviewArray.text: Well, finally, vitamin complexes with a truly balanced composition appeared on sale! GoodLabs Multivitamin has a good dosage and is well absorbed by the body.
reviewArray.name: Maria Bart

reviewArray.text: I used to get sick often, but now not a single flu can knock me off my feet. Thats what good immunity means!
reviewArray.name: Christian Bart

reviewArray.text: For me personally, the Immunal complex is optimal in terms of price and quality. But unlike synthetic products, the composition here is natural and balanced, each component has a scientific support of its effectiveness.
reviewArray.name: Donnie Cowart

action.title: Multivitamins are maximum benefit in one package
action.desc: GoodLabs multicomplex vitamins is the easiest way to support the body during intense mental and physical exertion and to compensate for the missing vitamins and minerals in the body.

header.title: GoodLabs for a strong foundation for your health
header.desc: Our mission is to enable every person to live a quality life. We know that with the right supplements it is possible to prevent many health problems, live a full, happy life, and make your body the main assistant in achieving your goals.

family.title: The families of our employees use GoodLabs, too
family.text_1: We created this line of products as for our families. To do this, we combined the experience of the best specialists, modern scientific practices and advanced production sites. We managed to create a line of products meeting to the fullest the needs of a modern family in matters of health.
family.text_2: Vitamins and minerals from GoodLabs are included in the diet of our employees' families.

promo.title: Immunal
promo.item_2: Strengthens the body's defenses against viruses and bacteria
promo.item_4: Contains powerful natural immunomodulators beta-glucan and elderberry extract and a complex of vital vitamins and minerals
